info.title: Technical Services FTDC Requestion API
info.description:
This REST API is used to request FTDC from the Atlas API using a single API key with elevated (`GLOBAL_MONITORING_ADMIN`) privileges. This API implements its own security and access control to allow wider usage of this service while maintaining security and auditing at the individual user level.
Basic Auth is used with Username and passwords from the mongo users of the Atlas project. To be able to interact with the API, you need to have a db user in the `RequestDB` database. This will be replaced by Oauth authentication in future versions.

get.summary: Returns all jobs for a given cluster
get.description:
Returns all jobs for a given group and cluster.
Includes the job ID, as well as the latest status. This data is pulled from the Atlas API, and the status is updated beyond Atlas statuses by the Requestor and Storer.

404.description: The provided group/project id does not exist

get.summary: The current status of a single job
get.description:
Returns job status information for the passed job id.
Includes the job ID, as well as the latest status. This data is pulled from the Atlas API, and the status is updated beyond Atlas statuses by the Requestor and Storer.

404.description: The provided job ID does not exist
